title: Ukrainian lawmaker shot dead in Lviv as Zelenskyy says hunt for killer is under way – Europe live
summary: Ukrainian President announced that all available resources are being utilized in the investigation and pursuit of the killer. He emphasized the commitment to ensure justice and safety. The statement comes amid heightened security concerns in the region.

title: Buildup to Chelsea v Fulham, Bayern agree Jackson loan, Newcastle sign Woltemade – matchday live
summary: Emillia Hawkins provides a rolling report on the latest updates as the Premier League gears up for an active afternoon. Fans can expect live coverage of matches and developments. Stay tuned for real-time insights and key moments.

title: Bayern Munich agree £13m loan deal for Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson
summary: A German club has a £56 million option to purchase striker Jackson at the end of the season. His playing time has diminished due to recent signings of Liam Delap and João Pedro. Jackson is currently out of favor in the squad.

title: Chelsea v Fulham: Premier League – live
summary: Rob Smyth provides minute-by-minute updates from the west London derby at Stamford Bridge, ensuring fans are kept informed about the match's progress and key moments. The report captures the excitement and intensity of the rivalry between the teams. Stay tuned for real-time commentary and insights.

title: ‘The surfers were methodical and mesmerising’: Ed Templeton’s best phone picture
summary: A US photographer observed young people having fun on an artificial wave in central Munich. He felt envious of their enjoyment and the vibrant atmosphere. The scene highlighted the city's unique recreational offerings.
